chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Now we will see what are timestamps and what is extract function and how we will use it in SQL

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So first of all we will see what is timestamp

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So timestamp is a data type which has date and time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So we call it timestamp

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And below that you can see different ways through which you can represent timestamp

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So first is your time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So it contains time in it, obviously

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And its format is hours, minutes and second format

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And second is your date type

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So it stores your date and its format is year, month and then date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And then it has year, so if you want to store only year data like 2022

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can store in this format

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And if you want to store only last two digits like 2022

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can use format for that

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And then comes timestamp, so it has date and time both

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Which we saw in the starting heading

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And in its format, you get date and time format together

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And in last comes time zone with timestamp

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see date, time and time zone are contained in it

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And we call it timestamp TZ

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So these are some ways through which we represent timestamp

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And play with time and date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: After this we can see that timestamp has some functions or operators

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see some examples here

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Like one is show time zone

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So it will tell you that in which time zone your SQL server is running

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: After this comes select now, so it also tells you date and time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Select time of day, then time current

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Then current time and current date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: We can run it in SQL and see what output we get

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And in most of the cases, these functions, timestamp functions or operators

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: You use them when you are making your own database

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Means when you are making a database, then if you want to store data

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Then you will use these functions or operators

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So we are in SQL, here we run show time zone

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see from the name, the time zone will show you

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see that my SQL is running

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Its time zone is Asia, Calcutta

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So India's time zone is from Calcutta

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: After that comes the second one, select now

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So if you run this

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see here it has given you date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: First comes year, then month and then date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So today as I am recording, it is 14th October 2022

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And after that it is showing time here, 18, 13 and 01 second

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And after that it shows you the standard time zone

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: After that you can see time of day

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So it will tell you what time is happening in the day and what is the date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: It tells you Friday, October month and then date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And then it shows you the time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: After that if we run current time, it will only give you time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So in output you can see 18, means 6 PM, 13 minutes and 49 seconds

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: After that comes mini seconds

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And after that if we see current date, it will only give you date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see 2022, 10, 14

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you will mostly use this, suppose you are making your own database

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: If you want to store only date in that table, like payment date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Then you can use current time date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So as soon as someone makes a payment, it will fill the current time or date in the database

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Similarly you can use current time and time of the day

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: If you use now, it will give you date, time, year, month and everything with time zone

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And you mostly use time zone to see which zone is specific

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So these are your functions and operators related to time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Now let's see what is extract function in SQL

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see from the name of extract function

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: That this extract function helps you to extract any part of any date or time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So for that we use extract function

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And if you see its syntax, it is very simple

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Select, then you use extract

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And inside the bracket, whatever you want to extract

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Like if I have a date, any column of date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: I want to extract month from that, so you can write month

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: If you want to do year or any other value, you can write that here

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And you can extract from table

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Now you can see below, what values you can extract from that

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Most of the time, the most common

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you will use these data points a lot when you work in SQL

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: When you work on real time data

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So let's practice this in SQL and see something

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So there is a table in SQL, named payment

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And there are 4 columns in it

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Customer ID, Amount, how much money is paid

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Mod, from which mode of transaction money is paid

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And lastly, payment date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So let's apply extract function on this payment date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So I say, like extract

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: First of all, we do month

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: From

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And now

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Payment date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: We save this with a name

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So I say as

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Payment month

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And let's put down from payment

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Let's write payment date on the side

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So that we can compare

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see here

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: It was 2029, 24th

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: It was 9th month, so you can see here, it has extracted 9th month

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So in this way, you can use extract function

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Apart from this, if you want to use only year

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: That you only want to extract year

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Here I am writing, pay year

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Let's run this

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see here, where it was 2020

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: It has extracted 2020

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Where it was 2021, it has extracted 2021

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Right

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Apart from this, it will be very important if we write

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Day of week

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And I say, day of week

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Run

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So this day of week, it will tell you, which day is in week

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Means Sunday, Monday, Tuesday

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: It will tell you

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So here, the date is Thursday

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So it has represented Thursday with 4

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And here, you can see, 27th April

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: That day is Monday

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Right, so in this way, you can take day of week

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Where 0 means Sunday

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Apart from this, if you want to extract time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can do that too

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: But in our case, there is no time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Because you can see here, payment date is only date in column

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So it can't extract hours or minutes

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: But apart from this, you can do something else

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Like I want to extract day

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Right, which day is it

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Means what is the date

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So you can see, it was 24th, so I have extracted 24th

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So if you want only day, you can extract date from here

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Apart from this, you can extract quarter

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Right, so I run quarter

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: Now you can see, it is showing quarter too

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So your 9th month comes in 3rd quarter

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: And your 4th month comes in 2nd quarter

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: The 1st month comes in 1st quarter

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So in this way, you can see, you can extract quarter too

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So this is your extract function

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So we have done in SQL too

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: So with the help of this, you can extract any date or time

chunks.title: TimeStamp and Extract Funct
chunks.text: According to your use case

text: Now we will see what are timestamps and what is extract function and how we will use it in SQL So first of all we will see what is timestamp So timestamp is a data type which has date and time So we call it timestamp And below that you can see different ways through which you can represent timestamp So first is your time So it contains time in it, obviously And its format is hours, minutes and second format And second is your date type So it stores your date and its format is year, month and then date And then it has year, so if you want to store only year data like 2022 So you can store in this format And if you want to store only last two digits like 2022 So you can use format for that And then comes timestamp, so it has date and time both Which we saw in the starting heading And in its format, you get date and time format together And in last comes time zone with timestamp So you can see date, time and time zone are contained in it And we call it timestamp TZ So these are some ways through which we represent timestamp And play with time and date After this we can see that timestamp has some functions or operators So you can see some examples here Like one is show time zone So it will tell you that in which time zone your SQL server is running After this comes select now, so it also tells you date and time Select time of day, then time current Then current time and current date We can run it in SQL and see what output we get And in most of the cases, these functions, timestamp functions or operators You use them when you are making your own database Means when you are making a database, then if you want to store data Then you will use these functions or operators So we are in SQL, here we run show time zone So you can see from the name, the time zone will show you So you can see that my SQL is running Its time zone is Asia, Calcutta So India's time zone is from Calcutta After that comes the second one, select now So if you run this So you can see here it has given you date First comes year, then month and then date So today as I am recording, it is 14th October 2022 And after that it is showing time here, 18, 13 and 01 second And after that it shows you the standard time zone After that you can see time of day So it will tell you what time is happening in the day and what is the date It tells you Friday, October month and then date And then it shows you the time After that if we run current time, it will only give you time So in output you can see 18, means 6 PM, 13 minutes and 49 seconds After that comes mini seconds And after that if we see current date, it will only give you date So you can see 2022, 10, 14 So you will mostly use this, suppose you are making your own database If you want to store only date in that table, like payment date Then you can use current time date So as soon as someone makes a payment, it will fill the current time or date in the database Similarly you can use current time and time of the day If you use now, it will give you date, time, year, month and everything with time zone And you mostly use time zone to see which zone is specific So these are your functions and operators related to time Now let's see what is extract function in SQL So you can see from the name of extract function That this extract function helps you to extract any part of any date or time So for that we use extract function And if you see its syntax, it is very simple Select, then you use extract And inside the bracket, whatever you want to extract Like if I have a date, any column of date I want to extract month from that, so you can write month If you want to do year or any other value, you can write that here And you can extract from table Now you can see below, what values you can extract from that Most of the time, the most common So you will use these data points a lot when you work in SQL When you work on real time data So let's practice this in SQL and see something So there is a table in SQL, named payment And there are 4 columns in it Customer ID, Amount, how much money is paid Mod, from which mode of transaction money is paid And lastly, payment date So let's apply extract function on this payment date So I say, like extract First of all, we do month From And now Payment date We save this with a name So I say as Payment month And let's put down from payment Let's write payment date on the side So that we can compare So you can see here It was 2029, 24th It was 9th month, so you can see here, it has extracted 9th month So in this way, you can use extract function Apart from this, if you want to use only year That you only want to extract year Here I am writing, pay year Let's run this So you can see here, where it was 2020 It has extracted 2020 Where it was 2021, it has extracted 2021 Right Apart from this, it will be very important if we write Day of week And I say, day of week Run So this day of week, it will tell you, which day is in week Means Sunday, Monday, Tuesday It will tell you So here, the date is Thursday So it has represented Thursday with 4 And here, you can see, 27th April That day is Monday Right, so in this way, you can take day of week Where 0 means Sunday Apart from this, if you want to extract time So you can do that too But in our case, there is no time Because you can see here, payment date is only date in column So it can't extract hours or minutes But apart from this, you can do something else Like I want to extract day Right, which day is it Means what is the date So you can see, it was 24th, so I have extracted 24th So if you want only day, you can extract date from here Apart from this, you can extract quarter Right, so I run quarter Now you can see, it is showing quarter too So your 9th month comes in 3rd quarter And your 4th month comes in 2nd quarter The 1st month comes in 1st quarter So in this way, you can see, you can extract quarter too So this is your extract function So we have done in SQL too So with the help of this, you can extract any date or time According to your use case
